landing.title: E-Monogram
landing.subtitle: Choose how you'd like to begin reading

beginning.title: Nina's Story - Beginning
beginning.paragraph1: Nina was born in Beidou, Changhua, a small town in Taiwan.
beginning.paragraph2: Growing up in a close-knit family, she learned the values of love and togetherness.

family.title: Nina's Family
family.paragraph1: Her family includes Grandpa, Grandma, Dad, and Mom.
family.paragraph2: She has an older sister who passed away when Nina was 5, and a younger brother, 5 years younger.

journey.title: Nina's Journey
journey.paragraph1: Through life's ups and downs, Nina learned to cherish every moment.
journey.paragraph2: Her experiences shaped her into the person she is today.

whenTwoPathsMeet.title: When Two Paths Meet
whenTwoPathsMeet.paragraph1: In life's journey, two separate paths began to converge.
whenTwoPathsMeet.paragraph2: Nina and Jianda's stories were about to intertwine.

theMeeting.title: The Meeting
theMeeting.paragraph1: When Jianda and Nina met, their individual stories merged into one.
theMeeting.paragraph2: Two lives became connected, creating a new chapter together.

together.title: Together
together.paragraph1: From this point forward, their stories combine into one beautiful narrative.
together.paragraph2: Two hearts, one journey, an unending story of love.

beginning.title: Jianda's Story - Beginning
beginning.paragraph1: Jianda was born in Dalin, Chiay, a small town in Taiwan.
beginning.paragraph2: From a young age, he learned the importance of family and hard work.

family.title: Jianda's Family
family.paragraph1: His family includes Dad (Air-Conditioner worker, fierce looking, likes to farm),
family.paragraph2: Mom (full-time housewife, kind to everyone, good at cooking),
family.paragraph3: and an older sister, 3 years older (grown up together, Pharmacy PhD now).

journey.title: Jianda's Journey
journey.paragraph1: His Grandma, who took good care of him when he was small,
journey.paragraph2: passed away when Jianda was in college, leaving lasting memories.
